title: Sales_Accelerator v2: Publish Issue_Tracker issue status + links back to deal-risk remediation

sections.text: Implement the outbound sync from Issue_Tracker to Sales_Accelerator v2 so that when an issue’s status changes (e.g., triaged/in progress/resolved), Sales_Accelerator receives an updated remediation signal for impacted deals. Include the issue identifier, current status, last-updated timestamp, and deep links to the Issue_Tracker issue + linked downstream eng work (Linear/Jira) for seller context. Add idempotency and retry/backoff handling, plus logging/metrics for successful vs. failed updates.
